folder.name: Global Functions
folder.tiptext: Functions that can be added to your script

action.name: goto
action.tiptext: Go to the specified frame of the movie

action.name: gotoAndPlay
action.tiptext: Go to the specified frame and play

action.name: gotoAndStop
action.tiptext: Go to the specified frame and stop

action.name: nextFrame
action.tiptext: Go to the next frame

action.name: prevFrame
action.tiptext: Go to the previous frame

action.name: nextScene
action.tiptext: Go to the next scene

action.name: prevScene
action.tiptext: Go to the previous scene

action.name: play
action.tiptext: Start playing the movie

action.name: stop
action.tiptext: Stop playing the movie

action.name: stopAllSounds
action.tiptext: Stop playing all sounds

folder.name: Browser/Network
folder.tiptext: Functions that control the Web browser and network

action.name: getURL
action.tiptext: Tell Web browser to navigate to specified URL

action.name: loadMovie
action.tiptext: Loads a SWF, JPEG, GIF or PNG from an URL into a movie clip

action.name: unloadMovie
action.tiptext: Unload a movie clip loaded with loadMovie

action.name: loadVariables
action.tiptext: Load variables from an URL

action.name: loadMovie
action.tiptext: Loads a SWF, JPEG, GIF or PNG from an URL into a movie clip

action.name: loadMovieNum
action.tiptext: Loads a SWF, JPEG, GIF or PNG from an URL into a level

action.name: loadVariables
action.tiptext: Load variables from an URL

action.name: loadVariablesNum
action.tiptext: Load variables from an URL into a level

action.name: unloadMovie
action.tiptext: Unload a movie clip loaded with loadMovie

action.name: unloadMovieNum
action.tiptext: Unload a movie clip loaded with loadMovieNum

action.name: fscommand
action.tiptext: Sends FSCommand to movie's container

action.name: trace
action.tiptext: Sends a message to the Output window

string.name: setInterval
string.tiptext: Initialize a periodic callback

string.name: clearInterval
string.tiptext: Cancel a periodic callback

string.name: eval
string.tiptext: Returns value of variable named by the expresssion

string.name: getTimer
string.tiptext: The number of milliseconds since the movie started playing

string.name: escape
string.tiptext: Escapes characters in a string not permitted in URLs

string.name: unescape
string.tiptext: Unescapes %XX hex sequences in a string

string.name: getVersion
string.tiptext: Get version number of Flash Player

string.name: parseInt
string.tiptext: Parses a string into an integer

string.name: parseFloat
string.tiptext: Parses a string into a floating-point number

string.name: isFinite
string.tiptext: Tests whether a number is finite

string.name: isNaN
string.tiptext: Tests whether a number is NaN (Not A Number)

string.name: String
string.tiptext: Converts argument to type string

string.name: Number
string.tiptext: Converts argument to type number

string.name: Boolean
string.tiptext: Converts argument to type boolean

string.name: Array
string.tiptext: Constructs array from arguments

string.name: Object
string.tiptext: Converts argument to corresponding object type

property.name: _quality
property.tiptext: Current rendering quality as string: LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH or BEST

property.name: _soundbuftime
property.tiptext: Number of seconds of sound to prebuffer, default = 5

folder.name: Identifiers
folder.tiptext: Access to the timelines of other loaded movie clips, both relative and absolute.

string.name: _global
string.tiptext: The global object, which holds global variables

string.name: _root
string.tiptext: The root Movie Clip of the current level, e.g. _level0 or _level2

string.name: _parent
string.tiptext: The parent Movie Clip of the current Movie Clip

string.name: _level
string.tiptext: A numbered level loaded with loadMovie, like _level1

string.name: this
string.tiptext: The current object; container of executing script or method

property.name: _focusrect
property.tiptext: Returns false if tab focus rectangles are hidden, true if displayed

string.tiptext: Put double quotes around string literals in an expression
Use parentheses to group expressions, i.e. (x+y)*z
Add numbers
Subtract numbers
Multiply numbers
Divides first number by the second number
Calculate the remainder of x divided by y
Test equality
Test strict equality
Test strict inequality
Test inequality
Less than
Greater than
Less than or equal to
Greater than or equal to
Short-circuit logical AND operator
Short-circuit logical OR operator
Logical NOT operator

folder.name: Bitwise Operators
folder.tiptext: Operators that manipulate bits (AND, OR, XOR, etc.)

string.tiptext: Bitwise AND operator
Bitwise OR operator
Bitwise XOR operator
Shifts left by a number of bits
Shifts right by a number of bits
Shifts right by a number of bits (unsigned)
Bitwise one's complement operator
Store the value of B in A
Store the bitwise OR of A and B in A
Store the bitwise AND of A and B in A
Store the bitwise XOR of A and B in A
Store the sum A + B in A
Store the value A - B in A
Stores the value A * B in A
Stores the quotient A / B in A
Stores the remainder A % B in A
Stores A shifted left by B bits in A
Stores A shifted right by B bits in A
Stores A shifted right by B bits in A (unsigned)
Conditional operator. Example: a ? b : c
Increments a variable. Example: x++, ++y
Decrements a variable. Example: x--, --y

string.name: typeof
string.tiptext: Returns the type of expression x

string.name: instanceof
string.tiptext: Returns whether a is of class b

string.name: void
string.tiptext: Evaluates expression, return undefined

folder.name: Variables
folder.tiptext: Actions that modify and access variables

action.name: set variable
action.tiptext: Set a variable

action.name: with
action.tiptext: Actions within with operate on the specified object

action.name: delete
action.tiptext: Delete a variable or object

action.name: var
action.tiptext: Declares local variables

action.name: if
action.tiptext: Performs actions if a condition is true

action.name: else
action.tiptext: Inside if, perform actions if condition is false

action.name: else if
action.tiptext: Inside if, perform actions if alternate condition is true

action.name: while
action.tiptext: Perform actions while the condition is true.

action.name: do while
action.tiptext: Do While Loop

action.name: for..in
action.tiptext: Enumerates the children of an object

action.name: for
action.tiptext: For Loop

action.name: break
action.tiptext: Break out of the enclosing loop

action.name: continue
action.tiptext: Continue at the start of the enclosing loop

action.name: switch
action.tiptext: Performs a block of code based on a condition

action.name: case
action.tiptext: Identifies a block of code inside a 'switch' statement

action.name: default
action.tiptext: Identifies the default block of code in a 'switch' statement

action.name: try
action.tiptext: Try a block of code with exception handling

action.name: catch
action.tiptext: Catches an exception

action.name: finally
action.tiptext: Executes code after exception handling

action.name: throw
action.tiptext: Throws an exception

action.name: class
action.tiptext: Declares a class construct

action.name: interface
action.tiptext: Declared an interface construct

string.name: extends
string.tiptext: Subclasses another class or interface

string.name: implements
string.tiptext: Implements the functions of an interface

string.name: static
string.tiptext: Declares a class member static

string.name: public
string.tiptext: Declares a class member public

string.name: private
string.tiptext: Declares a class member private

action.name: import
action.tiptext: Imports a class or interface for use in the following script

string.name: intrinsic
string.tiptext: Allows compile-time type checking of previously defined classes

string.name: dynamic
string.tiptext: Declares a class dynamic

string.name: get
string.tiptext: Declares a class member function an implicit getter

string.name: set
string.tiptext: Declares a class member function an implicit setter

string.name: super
string.tiptext: Superclass operator; invokes constructor/method of superclass

folder.name: User-Defined Functions
folder.tiptext: Actions that create and invoke functions

action.name: function
action.tiptext: Declares a user-defined function

action.name: return
action.tiptext: Returns a value from a function

string.name: callee
string.tiptext: Function object that is being invoked

string.name: caller
string.tiptext: Function object that invoked this function

string.name: length
string.tiptext: Number of arguments passed to this function

string.name: new Array
string.tiptext: Creates a new Array object

string.name: concat
string.tiptext: Concatenates this array to others and return new array

string.name: join
string.tiptext: Joins all array elements into string

string.name: pop
string.tiptext: Remove last item in array and return it

string.name: push
string.tiptext: Append new item to the end of array

string.name: reverse
string.tiptext: Rearranges the elements of an array into reverse order

string.name: shift
string.tiptext: Remove first item in array and return it

string.name: slice
string.tiptext: Returns new array of elements from indexA to indexB

string.name: sort
string.tiptext: Sorts an array

string.name: sortOn
string.tiptext: Sorts an array, using object property as sort key

string.name: splice
string.tiptext: Delete count items at index, insert elems if specified

string.name: toString
string.tiptext: Return string of all array elements separated by commas

string.name: unshift
string.tiptext: Insert a new item at the beginning of the array

string.name: length
string.tiptext: Length of the array

folder.name: Constants
folder.tiptext: Constant properties of the Array class

string.name: CASEINSENSITIVE
string.tiptext: Sort without case sensitivity

string.name: DESCENDING
string.tiptext: Sort in descending order

string.name: UNIQUESORT
string.tiptext: Return error if sort is not unique

string.name: RETURNINDEXEDARRAY
string.tiptext: Return indexed array

string.name: NUMERIC
string.tiptext: Sort numerically

string.name: new Boolean
string.tiptext: Creates a new Boolean object

string.name: toString
string.tiptext: Convert Boolean object to string

string.name: valueOf
string.tiptext: Convert Boolean object to primitive type (boolean)

folder.name: Error
folder.tiptext: Class for creating new error objects

string.name: new Error
string.tiptext: Creates a new Error object

string.name: name
string.tiptext: Name of the error

string.name: message
string.tiptext: Text of the error message

string.name: toString
string.tiptext: Convert Error object to string

string.name: SOFT1
string.tiptext: Virtual key code for SOFT1

string.name: SOFT2
string.tiptext: Virtual key code for SOFT2

string.name: SOFT3
string.tiptext: Virtual key code for SOFT3

string.tiptext: Virtual key code for SOFT4

string.tiptext: Virtual key code for SOFT5

string.tiptext: Virtual key code for SOFT6

string.tiptext: Virtual key code for SOFT7

string.tiptext: Virtual key code for SOFT8

string.tiptext: Virtual key code for SOFT9

string.tiptext: Virtual key code for SOFT10

string.name: SOFT11
string.tiptext: Virtual key code for SOFT11

string.name: SOFT12
string.tiptext: Virtual key code for SOFT12

string.name: call
string.tiptext: Invokes the function with specified parameters

string.name: apply
string.tiptext: Invokes the function with parameters in array

folder.name: Math
folder.tiptext: Class that provides mathematical functions and properties

string.name: abs
string.tiptext: Absolute value

string.name: acos
string.tiptext: Calculate arccosine, in radians

string.name: asin
string.tiptext: Calculate arcsine, in radians

string.name: atan
string.tiptext: Calculate arctangent, in radians

string.name: atan2
string.tiptext: Calculates arctangent of y/x, in radians

string.name: ceil
string.tiptext: Calculate ceiling of number (round up)

string.name: cos
string.tiptext: Calculate cosine of angle (radians)

string.name: exp
string.tiptext: Exponential function

string.name: floor
string.tiptext: Calculate floor of number (round down)

string.name: log
string.tiptext: Natural logarithm

string.name: min
string.tiptext: Compute minimum of two numbers

string.name: max
string.tiptext: Compute maximum of two numbers

string.name: pow
string.tiptext: Calculate x to the power of y

string.name: random
string.tiptext: Generate a random number between 0 and 1

string.name: round
string.tiptext: Rounds a number to the nearest integer

string.name: sin
string.tiptext: Calculate sine of angle (radians)

string.name: sqrt
string.tiptext: Square root

string.name: tan
string.tiptext: Calculate tangent of angle (radians)

folder.name: Constants
folder.tiptext: Constant properties of the Math class

string.name: E
string.tiptext: Euler's constant, approx 2.718

string.name: LN10
string.tiptext: Natural logarithm of 10, approx 2.302

string.name: LN2
string.tiptext: Natural logarithm of 2, approx 0.693

string.name: LOG10E
string.tiptext: Base 10 logarithm of E, approx 0.434

string.name: LOG2E
string.tiptext: Base 2 logarithm of E, approx 1.443

string.name: PI
string.tiptext: The value of pi, approx 3.14159

string.name: SQRT1_2
string.tiptext: Square root of 1/2, approx 0.707

string.name: SQRT2
string.tiptext: Square root of 2, approx 1.414

string.name: new Number
string.tiptext: Creates a new Number object

string.name: toString
string.tiptext: Converts Number object to string, with optional radix conversion

string.name: valueOf
string.tiptext: Convert Number object to primitive type (number)

folder.name: Constants
folder.tiptext: Constant properties of the Number class

string.name: MIN_VALUE
string.tiptext: The smallest representable number

string.name: MAX_VALUE
string.tiptext: The largest representable number

string.name: POSITIVE_INFINITY
string.tiptext: Positive infinity

string.name: NEGATIVE_INFINITY
string.tiptext: Negative infinity

string.name: NaN
string.tiptext: NaN (Not A Number)

folder.name: Object
folder.tiptext: Object is the primitive ActionScript class type

string.name: new Object
string.tiptext: Creates a new Object object

string.name: toString
string.tiptext: Converts this object to its string representation

string.name: valueOf
string.tiptext: Returns the primitive value of this object

string.name: watch
string.tiptext: Add a watchpoint on an object property

string.name: unwatch
string.tiptext: Removes a watchpoint created with Object.watch

string.name: registerClass
string.tiptext: Associates a linkage identifier with an object class

string.name: addProperty
string.tiptext: Registers a getter/setter property on an object

string.name: __proto__
string.tiptext: Prototype object that this object inherits from

string.name: __resolve
string.tiptext: Reference to a user-defined function that is invoked if ActionScript code refers to an undefined property or method

folder.name: String
folder.tiptext: Class that helps you work with strings

string.name: new String
string.tiptext: Creates a new String object

string.name: charAt
string.tiptext: Return character at specified index

string.name: charCodeAt
string.tiptext: Return character code at specified index

string.name: fromCharCode
string.tiptext: Construct string from character codes

string.name: toUpperCase
string.tiptext: Return string converted to uppercase

string.name: toLowerCase
string.tiptext: Return string converted to lowercase

string.name: concat
string.tiptext: Concatenate string to other strings

string.name: indexOf
string.tiptext: Search string for substring, return index or -1

string.name: lastIndexOf
string.tiptext: Search string backwards for substring

string.name: slice
string.tiptext: Returns slice of string between two indices

string.name: substring
string.tiptext: Returns substring of string between two indices

string.name: split
string.tiptext: Splits string into array of strings using delimiter

string.name: substr
string.tiptext: Returns substring of count chars starting at index

string.name: toString
string.tiptext: Returns the object explicitly as a String

string.name: valueOf
string.tiptext: Returns the primitive value of the string

string.name: length
string.tiptext: Returns the length of a String object

folder.name: Event Handlers
folder.tiptext: Event handlers of the System class

string.name: onStatus
string.tiptext: Invoked when an object does not define its own onStatus handler

string.name: hasAccessibility
string.tiptext: If true, system has Accessibility features

string.name: hasAudio
string.tiptext: If true, system has audio capabilities

string.name: hasAudioEncoder
string.tiptext: If true, system can encode audio

string.name: hasEmbeddedVideo
string.tiptext: If true, system has embedded video capabilities

string.name: hasMP3
string.tiptext: If true, the system has MP3 sound capabilities

string.name: hasPrinting
string.tiptext: If true, the system has printing capabilities

string.name: hasScreenBroadcast
string.tiptext: If true, the system has screen broadcast capabilities

string.name: hasScreenPlayback
string.tiptext: If true, the system has screen playback capabilities

string.name: hasStreamingAudio
string.tiptext: If true, the system can stream audio

string.name: hasStreamingVideo
string.tiptext: If true, the system can stream video

string.name: hasVideoEncoder
string.tiptext: If true, the system can encode video

string.name: isDebugger
string.tiptext: If true, the Flash Player is a debugger version

string.name: language
string.tiptext: Contains the system language setting

string.name: os
string.tiptext: Contains the system os

string.name: version
string.tiptext: Contains Flash Player version

string.name: avHardwareDisable
string.tiptext: If true, the camera and microphone are disabled

string.name: localFileReadDisable
string.tiptext: If true, reading local files is disabled

string.name: allowDomain
string.tiptext: Allows movies from other domains to access current movie

string.name: allowInsecureDomain
string.tiptext: Allows movies from an insecure domain to access current movie in secure domain

string.name: loadPolicyFile
string.tiptext: Allows movies to specify the location of a policy file

string.name: useCodepage
string.tiptext: If true, Flash Player uses code page of the OS

folder.name: Sound
folder.tiptext: Class that helps you work with sound

string.name: new Sound
string.tiptext: Creates a sound object

string.name: getPan
string.tiptext: Gets the pan of sound

string.name: getTransform
string.tiptext: Gets the current sound transform

string.name: getVolume
string.tiptext: Gets the volume percentage

string.name: setPan
string.tiptext: Sets the pan of sound

string.name: setTransform
string.tiptext: Set each channel to a combination of left and right channel

string.name: setVolume
string.tiptext: Set the volume percentage

string.name: stop
string.tiptext: Stops all sounds

string.name: attachSound
string.tiptext: Attach a sound located in the library

string.name: loadSound
string.tiptext: Download a MP3 sound.

string.name: getBytesLoaded
string.tiptext: Returns the number of bytes that have download during the loadSound() operation.

string.name: getBytesTotal
string.tiptext: Returns the size of the file that is currently being downloaded.

string.name: start
string.tiptext: Starts playing the last attached sound

string.name: position
string.tiptext: Number of milliseconds sound has been playing for

string.name: duration
string.tiptext: Duration of sound in milliseconds

folder.name: Event Handlers
folder.tiptext: Event handlers of the Sound class

string.name: onSoundComplete
string.tiptext: Invoked when sound has completed playing

string.name: onLoad
string.tiptext: Invoked when loaded sound has been received

string.name: onID3
string.tiptext: Invoked when ID3 tag information is available

string.name: getDepth
string.tiptext: Returns the absolute "z" order of the button

string.name: enabled
string.tiptext: If true, button is enabled; if false, disabled

string.name: tabIndex
string.tiptext: Tab index of button

string.name: tabEnabled
string.tiptext: If true, tab stop enabled; if false, disabled

string.name: trackAsMenu
string.tiptext: Track as Menu Item for Buttons

string.name: _x
string.tiptext: X position of the button

string.name: _y
string.tiptext: Y position of the button

string.name: _xmouse
string.tiptext: X position of the mouse

string.name: _ymouse
string.tiptext: Y position of the mouse

string.name: _xscale
string.tiptext: X scale factor of the button (percentage)

string.name: _yscale
string.tiptext: Y scale factor of the button (percentage)

string.name: _width
string.tiptext: Width of the button

string.name: _height
string.tiptext: Height of the button

string.name: _alpha
string.tiptext: Alpha transparency of the button (percentage)

string.name: _visible
string.tiptext: Returns true if the button is visible, false if hidden

string.name: _rotation
string.tiptext: Angle of rotation of the button (degrees)

string.name: _name
string.tiptext: Instance name of the button

string.name: _target
string.tiptext: Target path of the button

string.name: _focusrect
string.tiptext: Returns false if tab focus rectangles are hidden, true if displayed

string.name: _url
string.tiptext: URL the button was loaded from

string.name: _parent
string.tiptext: The parent of the current button

string.name: _quality
string.tiptext: Sets or retrieves the rendering quality used for a SWF file

string.name: _soundbuftime
string.tiptext: Specifies the number of seconds a sound prebuffers before it starts to stream

string.name: onPress
string.tiptext: Invoked when press event occurs

string.name: onRelease
string.tiptext: Invoked when release event occurs

string.name: onReleaseOutside
string.tiptext: Invoked when releaseOutside event occurs

string.name: onRollOver
string.tiptext: Invoked when rollOver event occurs

string.name: onRollOut
string.tiptext: Invoked when rollOut event occurs

string.name: onDragOver
string.tiptext: Invoked when dragOver event occurs

string.name: onDragOut
string.tiptext: Invoked when dragOut event occurs

string.name: onSetFocus
string.tiptext: Invoked when button receives focus

string.name: onKillFocus
string.tiptext: Invoked when button loses focus

string.name: onKeyUp
string.tiptext: Invoked when the button has input focus and a key is released

string.name: onKeyDown
string.tiptext: Invoked when the button has input focus and a key is pressed

folder.name: Color

string.tiptext: Sets the color transform

folder.name: Key

folder.name: Mouse
folder.tiptext: Class that controls the mouse cursor

string.name: addListener
string.tiptext: Adds a listener for onMouseDown/onMouseMove/onMouseUp events

string.name: removeListener
string.tiptext: Removes a listener for onMouseDown/onMouseMove/onMouseUp events

string.name: onMouseDown
string.tiptext: Listener invoked when mouse button is pressed

string.name: onMouseMove
string.tiptext: Listener invoked when mouse is moved

string.name: onMouseUp
string.tiptext: Listener invoked when mouse button is released

folder.name: MovieClipLoader
folder.tiptext: Object used to load SWF, JPEG, GIF or PNG files into a movie clip or level

string.name: new MovieClipLoader
string.tiptext: Creates new MovieClipLoader object

string.name: addListener
string.tiptext: Adds a listener for the MovieClipLoader events

string.name: getProgress
string.tiptext: Returns an object containing information about the download progress

string.name: loadClip
string.tiptext: Loads a url into a target movie clip or level

string.name: removeListener
string.tiptext: Removes a listener for the MovieClipLoader events

string.name: unloadClip
string.tiptext: Unloads a target movie clip or level

string.name: onLoadComplete
string.tiptext: Listener invoked when the download completes

string.name: onLoadError
string.tiptext: Listener invoked when the download fails due to an error

string.name: onLoadInit
string.tiptext: Listener invoked when the downloaded movie is initialized

string.name: onLoadProgress
string.tiptext: Listener invoked when the download progresses by a Flash player defined amount

string.name: onLoadStart
string.tiptext: Listener invoked when the download starts

folder.name: Selection
folder.tiptext: Class that controls the edit text selection and focus

string.name: getFocus
string.tiptext: Gets the variable name of the focused edit text field

string.name: setFocus
string.tiptext: Sets the currently focused edit text field

string.name: addListener
string.tiptext: Adds a listener for the onSetFocus event

folder.name: Event Handlers
folder.tiptext: Event handlers of the Selection class

string.name: onSetFocus
string.tiptext: Notified when the input focus changes

folder.name: SharedObject
folder.tiptext: Class for working with locally saved data

string.name: flush
string.tiptext: Immediately writes a locally persistent shared object to a local file

string.name: clear
string.tiptext: Purges data from the shared object

string.name: getLocal
string.tiptext: Returns a reference to a locally persistent shared object

string.name: getSize
string.tiptext: Get the current size of the shared object, in bytes

string.name: data
string.tiptext: The attributes assigned to the data property of the object

folder.name: Event Handlers
folder.tiptext: Event handlers of the SharedObject class

string.name: onStatus
string.tiptext: Invoked when a status message is posted for a shared object

folder.name: Stage
folder.tiptext: Object that controls characteristics of the Flash movie stage

string.name: addListener
string.tiptext: Adds a listener for the onResize event

string.name: removeListener
string.tiptext: Removes a listener for the onResize event

string.name: scaleMode
string.tiptext: Flash movie scaling behavior: show all, exact fit, no border, or no scale

string.name: align
string.tiptext: Flash movie alignment behavior: centered(C), top(T), top-left(TL), etc.

string.name: width
string.tiptext: The current width of the Flash movie stage, in pixels

string.name: height
string.tiptext: The current height of the Flash movie stage, in pixels

folder.name: Event Handlers
folder.tiptext: Event handlers of the Stage object

string.name: onResize
string.tiptext: Invoked when Flash movie has resized

folder.name: TextField
folder.tiptext: Object which represents text field instances

string.name: removeTextField
string.tiptext: Removes a text field created with createTextField

string.name: replaceText
string.tiptext: Replace range of characters in text field

string.name: getTextFormat
string.tiptext: Get text format information

string.name: setTextFormat
string.tiptext: Set text format information

string.name: getNewTextFormat
string.tiptext: Get text format information for new text

string.name: setNewTextFormat
string.tiptext: Set text format information for new text

string.name: addListener
string.tiptext: Adds a listener for onChanged/onScroller events

string.name: removeListener
string.tiptext: Removes a listener for onChanged/onScroller events

string.name: getDepth
string.tiptext: Returns the absolute "z" order of the text field

string.name: scroll
string.tiptext: Index of first visible line in text field

string.name: bottomScroll
string.tiptext: Index of last visible line in text field

string.name: maxscroll
string.tiptext: Maximum value of .scroll in text field

string.name: type
string.tiptext: Type of text field ('dynamic' or 'input')

string.name: textColor
string.tiptext: Color of text in text field

string.name: borderColor
string.tiptext: Color of border of text field

string.name: backgroundColor
string.tiptext: Color of background of text field

string.name: text
string.tiptext: Current text in the text field

string.name: htmlText
string.tiptext: Current text in the text field, with HTML tags

string.name: autoSize
string.tiptext: Text field auto-sizes to fit text

string.name: variable
string.tiptext: Name of variable associated with text field

string.name: hscroll
string.tiptext: Current horizontal scrolling position

string.name: maxhscroll
string.tiptext: Maximum value of .hscroll in text field

string.name: maxChars
string.tiptext: Maximum number of characters that may be entered

string.name: embedFonts
string.tiptext: Boolean; if true, use embedded font outlines

string.name: html
string.tiptext: Boolean; if true, use HTML for variable representation

string.name: border
string.tiptext: Boolean; if true, display border around text field

string.name: background
string.tiptext: Boolean; if true, display background behind text field

string.name: wordWrap
string.tiptext: Boolean; if true, perform word wrap at line ends

string.name: password
string.tiptext: Boolean; if true, display asterisks to hide characters

string.name: multiline
string.tiptext: Boolean; if true, user may enter multipline lines

string.name: selectable
string.tiptext: Boolean; if true, user may select text with mouse/keyboard

string.name: length
string.tiptext: Length of text in .text property

string.name: textWidth
string.tiptext: Width of the text, in pixels

string.name: textHeight
string.tiptext: Height of the text, in pixels

string.name: tabIndex
string.tiptext: Tab index of text field

string.name: tabEnabled
string.tiptext: If true, tab stop enabled; if false, disabled

string.name: styleSheet
string.tiptext: CSS style sheet object to use for text field

string.name: condenseWhite
string.tiptext: If true, HTML whitespace will be condensed

string.name: _x
string.tiptext: X position of the text field

string.name: _y
string.tiptext: Y position of the text field

string.name: _xmouse
string.tiptext: X position of the mouse

string.name: _ymouse
string.tiptext: Y position of the mouse

string.name: _xscale
string.tiptext: X scale factor of the text field (percentage)

string.name: _yscale
string.tiptext: Y scale factor of the text field (percentage)

string.name: _width
string.tiptext: Width of the text field

string.name: _height
string.tiptext: Height of the text field

string.name: _alpha
string.tiptext: Alpha transparency of the text field (percentage)

string.name: _visible
string.tiptext: Returns true if the text field is visible, false if hidden

string.name: _rotation
string.tiptext: Angle of rotation of the text field (degrees)

string.name: _name
string.tiptext: Instance name of the text field

string.name: _target
string.tiptext: Target path of the text field

string.name: _url
string.tiptext: URL the text field was loaded from

string.name: _parent
string.tiptext: The parent of the current text field

string.name: _quality
string.tiptext: Returns false if low quality, true if high quality

string.name: _soundbuftime
string.tiptext: Specifies the number of seconds a sound prebuffers before it starts to stream

folder.name: Event Handlers
folder.tiptext: Event handlers of text field objects

string.name: onChanged
string.tiptext: Invoked when text changes

string.name: onSetFocus
string.tiptext: Invoked when text field receives focus

string.name: onKillFocus
string.tiptext: Invoked when text field loses focus

string.name: onScroller
string.tiptext: Invoked when scrolling position/range changes

folder.tiptext: Object that controls text formatting in text fields

string.name: getTextExtent
string.tiptext: Get X and Y extents of text

string.name: font
string.tiptext: Name of text font

string.name: size
string.tiptext: Point size of text

string.name: color
string.tiptext: Color of text

string.name: url
string.tiptext: URL hyperlink of text, null if none

string.name: target
string.tiptext: Target window of hyperlink, null if none

string.name: bold
string.tiptext: Boolean indicating whether text is bold

string.name: italic
string.tiptext: Boolean indicating whether text is italicized

string.name: underline
string.tiptext: Boolean indicating whether text is underlined

string.name: align
string.tiptext: Alignment of text (left, center, right)

string.name: leftMargin
string.tiptext: Left margin of text

string.name: rightMargin
string.tiptext: Right margin of text

string.name: indent
string.tiptext: Indentation of initial line in paragraph

string.name: blockIndent
string.tiptext: Indentation applied to all lines in paragraph

string.name: leading
string.tiptext: Inter-line leading of text

string.name: bullet
string.tiptext: Boolean indicating whether text is bulleted

string.name: tabStops
string.tiptext: Array indicating positions of tab stops

folder.tiptext: Objects specific to the Authoring Tool

folder.name: XMLUI
folder.tiptext: XMLUI enables communication with SWF files used as custom user interfaces.

string.tiptext: Makes the current XMLUI dialog exit with an "accept" state.

string.name: cancel
string.tiptext: Makes the current XMLUI dialog exit with a "cancel" state.

string.name: get
string.tiptext: Retrieves the value of the specified property of the current XMLUI dialog.

string.name: set
string.tiptext: Modifies the value of the specified property of the current XMLUI dialog.

string.name: toggleHighQuality
string.tiptext: Toggles between low and high quality

string.name: tellTarget
string.tiptext: Within tellTarget, commands operate on targeted movie clip

string.name: ifFrameLoaded
string.tiptext: Performs actions only if a particular frame is loaded

action.name: call
action.tiptext: Call a subroutine in a specified frame

string.tiptext: Not equals

string.name: and
string.tiptext: Logical AND

string.name: or
string.tiptext: Logical OR

string.name: not
string.tiptext: Logical NOT

string.name: add
string.tiptext: Concatenate strings together

string.name: eq
string.tiptext: Test equality (strings)

string.name: ne
string.tiptext: Test inequality (strings)

string.name: lt
string.tiptext: Less than (strings)

string.name: le
string.tiptext: Less than or equal to (strings)

string.name: ge
string.tiptext: Greater than or equal to (strings)

string.name: substring
string.tiptext: Extract count characters from string, starting at index'th character

string.name: length
string.tiptext: Calculate the length of the string

string.name: chr
string.tiptext: Convert an ASCII code to a character

string.name: ord
string.tiptext: Convert a character to an ASCII code

string.name: mbsubstring
string.tiptext: Extract count characters from string, starting at index'th character (multibyte aware)

string.name: mblength
string.tiptext: Calculate the length of the string (multibyte aware)

string.name: mbchr
string.tiptext: Convert an ASCII/S-JIS code to a character (multibyte aware)

string.name: mbord
string.tiptext: Convert a character to an ASCII/S-JIS code (multibyte aware)

string.name: int
string.tiptext: Extract the integer part of a number

string.name: random
string.tiptext: Generate a random number between 0 and specified number

string.name: _highquality (Button)
string.tiptext: Returns false if low quality, true if high quality

string.name: _highquality (TextField)
string.tiptext: Returns false if low quality, true if high quality

string.tiptext: Index of first visible line in text field
